attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Open a proper Dedicated Hospital for Soldiers injured whilst on duty serving their and our country on our behalf,as at the moment there is no longer any military hospitals left due to ill thought out policies by politicians. They should be put in a  hospital dedicated to treating injuries sustained on the battlefield.staffed by military Doctors/nurses that are trained in this type of injury and cared for until they are 100% cured, regardless of cost

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
